mapper.insert: INSERT INTO T_PROD_PLAN( id, prod_plan_code, ord_code, plan_status, oper_user_id, create_time, update_time ) VALUES ( #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{prodPlanCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ordCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{planStatus,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{operUserId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} )

INSERT INTO T_PROD_PLAN( id, prod_plan_code, ord_code, plan_status, oper_user_id, create_time, update_time ) VALUES
( #{tProdPlan.id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{tProdPlan.prodPlanCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tProdPlan.ordCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tProdPlan.planStatus,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{tProdPlan.operUserId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{tProdPlan.createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{tProdPlan.updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} )
mapper.update: UPDATE T_PROD_PLAN SET id = #{id}, prod_plan_code = #{prodPlanCode}, ord_code = #{ordCode}, plan_status = #{planStatus}, oper_user_id = #{operUserId}, create_time = #{createTime}, update_time = #{updateTime} WHERE id = #{id}
